def find_mth_lexicographical_permutation(n, m):
    s = 2
    c = n - 1
    arr = [0] * n
    i = 0
    while i <= c:
        r = 0
        j = s
        while j <= n and r < m:
            if j < n:
                r += 2 ** (n - j - 1)
            j += 1
        if j > s and j != n + 1:
            r -= 2 ** (n - j)
        m -= r
        j -= 1
        arr[i] = j
        while s < j:
            arr[c] = s
            c -= 1
            s += 1
        s += 1
        i += 1
    return arr
